chapter.title: About the project
chapter.para: NHibernate Validator is a powerful and extensible framework to validate objects on the .Net Platform. Born as a port of Hibernate Validator 3.0.0 project at december of 2007. Later many improvements and changes were made to the Core and API, and now we can say that NHibernate Validator is more than a port. NHibernate Validator is entirely written in C#. The first release of NHibernate Validator was entirely developed by Dario Quintana, Gustavo Ringel and Fabio Maulo.
NHibernate Validator is part of the NHibernate Contrib project and you can download it here.
